sources.title: Apocalypse of Ice | Full Movie | Action Disaster Sci-Fi | Tom Sizemore EXCLUSIVE!
sources.description:
Apocalypse of Ice - Already in the throes of a viral pandemic, a massive polar vortex threatens to cover nearly all of Earth in ice. When it's discovered the only chance of survival from the cold is a 100-mile temperate zone near the equator, a virologist, with the pandemic's only cure, must reach the safe zone within 24 hours if humanity is to have any hope of survival. 
2020.  Stars: Tom Sizemore, Emily Killian, Ramiro Leal
*Under exclusive license from The Asylum. All rights reserved*
